SR: 1. Open the Editor Selection Dialog.2. Press 'Add' for the associated editors.3. Verify that the multiple selection is enabled.4. Check if the default entry in the associated editors list is marked as 'default'.5. Ensure that the width hint is implemented for the dialog.6. Select the File editors Pref page and observe if it grows in height. Compare it with other pages to identify any discrepancies.
